name: Kawaii Katastrophe
description:
Defend your room against the vague, yet menacing terrors outside! In Kawaii Katastrophe you'll have to defend yourself inside your room to survive. Work with other survivors to scavenge for resources and defend your barricades. During the day, build up your defenses with the resources your friends have found. At night you must do everything you can in order to hold off as long as possible.

Developed for the Ludum Dare 37 Game Jam!

Questions or comments? Tweet me! @ObsessiveNerd
